thread.title: Film Solutions Names Industry Stalwart, Dan Glasser, As New CEO

author: cnbc.com
title: Film Solutions Names Industry Stalwart, Dan Glasser, As New CEO
text:
BURBANK, Calif., Feb. 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Film Solutions, a global leader in digital asset management and publicity work-flow solutions for the film and television industry, announced today that Dan Glasser will assume the role of CEO while current CEO and Founder, Kevin Matossian will become chairman of the board.
"Dan is the perfect fit for Film Solutions," said Kevin Matossian during a call with the company board. "His background in entertainment services, knowledge of technology, and experience in new media marketing makes him a formidable player for our space. We are excited to welcome Dan to our company."
Prior to joining Film Solutions, Glasser served as Chief Business Development Officer and Head of Content at Videri Inc, a technology company that developed a transformative consumer/enterprise product and cloud-based content management ecosystem. Before his time at Videri, Glasser was the General Manager of Deluxe MediaRecall, a distributed metadata and digital asset management platform. He also led North American cross-company initiatives on behalf of the senior management team of Deluxe Entertainment Services Group. Glasser also serves as the Chairman of the Tom Sherak MS Hope Foundation.
"I'm excited for the opportunity to grow Film Solutions' innovative offerings," said Glasser, "and to meet the needs of our ever-changing industry with a forward-focused approach. It's my goal to build on the client-first servicing culture that Kevin and the entire FS team have worked tirelessly to create."
Since its inception, Film Solutions has grown to become the premier servicing group for photographic publicity and marketing assets. In 2017, Film Solutions added Jennifer Pappalardo as Vice President of Television, Bonnie Taylor as Vice President of the Print Studio at Film Solutions, which provides fine art printing and curation services, and Jeffery Lerner as Vice President, Creative Content, providing production and editorial for EPK/BTS and creative content for film and television. In addition, Film Solutions offers a complete outsourced photo publicity option for film and television production companies.
Matossian, along with the Film Solutions board, will continue to oversee the company's growth as well as potential acquisition targets. Matossian exits Film Solutions to return to feature film production under his SilverCrest Entertainment banner.
About Film Solutions:
Film Solutions, creators of the FSMediaVault™ (formerly PKO™) platform, is a provider of film productivity and work-flow solutions. These systems are designed to give film and television professionals the ability to manage numerous elements of a production with greater security, efficiency and reliability while limiting their environmental impact. The Lab @ Film Solutions is a full service, union (Local 700) photo lab specializing in printing and image-related services commonly used by publicity and marketing teams for film & television promotion. Film Solutions also offers a robust team of photo editorial professionals as well as a full service creative team for behind-the-scenes production and promotional content.
